# GitHub Copilot Instructions

## Security First

**MANDATORY**: Read and follow `.ai/SECURITY_RULES.md`

Privacy, safety, and security are ALWAYS prioritized in EVERY action.

## Pre-Commit Checklist

Before ANY commit:
- [ ] No credentials in code (API keys, passwords, tokens)
- [ ] No sensitive files tracked (.env, .pem, .key, .log)
- [ ] No personal info in docs (emails, names)
- [ ] .gitignore properly configured
- [ ] CI/CD variables used for secrets
- [ ] Security audit passed

## Reference

Complete security requirements: `.ai/SECURITY_RULES.md`
